channel.title: LunixScape needs a Development Team!
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hi ;D
[center]I need a team to help me make an rsps. I made the website but I need a team to make the server stuff.
My idea was to make a server like Ritzscape. Ritzscape uses credits and you can buy all these cool customs. Some people hate servers with customs but they're not so bad.. I need [b]a server coder[/b],[b] a server client maker[/b], and [b]a server hoster[/b]. I already have the website :).
Also you can get real money if you do this. 70% of the server profits go to the people who helps out. But don't get excited, people will only donate if it gets popular :o
If you can do any of these, fill out a template and post it here :S
[u]Server Makers or Client Makers[/u] Name: Age: MSN: How much experience do you have: Any previous work you can show me: Any other stuff you wanna put in here?:
[u]Hoster[/u] Name: Age: MSN: How long can you host per day:
Also need a GFX Dude :) Name: Age: MSN: Previous Work: A little sample for me: [/center]

item.title: LunixScape needs a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Niphrite Niphrite
item.description:
@Niphrite wrote:

Ah k.
LOCK PLEASE.

In a year or so, I’ll make my own server. xD

Read full topic

item.title: LunixScape needs a Development Team!

if i were to code this one you would not be owner because a coder would be owner so aka fail

item.title: LunixScape needs a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Yea, it totally seems like you are using people to make you a server. Then you get owner rights, and 30% of donations? You don’t even have a base source? Also what kind of website did you make?

Read full topic

item.title: LunixScape needs a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Development teams usually require the owner to do some of the SERVER development, or at least some coding with the RSPS…

Read full topic

item.title: LunixScape needs a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @LifeandDeath562_Deat LifeandDeath562 Death
item.description:
@LifeandDeath562_Deat wrote:

Name: Patrick White
Age: 15
MSN: none at the moment I can get if need but i was assuming we would have vent or something to communicate?
How long can you host per day: pretty much 24/7

Im also a decent coder for 317s if thats what this is

Read full topic
